items.title: ACCORDING TO THE REPORT, INTERNAL DELIBERATIONS ARE FOCUSED NOT ON WHETHER A STRIKE WOULD OCCUR BUT ON ITS SCOPE AND POTENTIAL TARGETS. OPTIONS UNDER DISCUSSION INCLUDE NUCLEAR FACILITIES, MISSILE SITES, STATE INSTITUTIONS AND INFRASTRUCTURE, THE OFFICIALS SAID, ACCORDING TO ISRAEL HAYOM
